sections.label: Intro
content: Am  Am/F#  Em  Em/F#  G
Am  F  Em  Em/F#
G  Am  D  G  G/F#  C  C/B  Am  Bm/F#  Bm  D

sections.label: Verse 1
content: Am   Am/F#  Em    Em/F# G
Karma police, arrest this man, he talks in maths
Em/F#  G              Am        D        G  G/F# C  C/B  Am  Bm/F#  Bm  D
He buzzes like a fridge, he's like a detuned radio

sections.label: Verse 2
content: Am   Am/F#  Em    Em/F# G
Karma police, arrest this girl, her Hitler hairdo
Em/F#  G              Am       D       G  G/F# C  C/B  Am  Bm/F#  Bm  D
Is making me feel ill, and we have crashed her party

sections.label: Chorus
content: C              D           G   F#
This is what you'll get
C              D           G   F#
This is what you'll get
C              D           G          Bm        C  C  Bm  D
This is what you'll get, when you mess with us

sections.label: Verse 3
content: Am   Am/F#  Em    Em/F# G
Karma police, I've given all I can, it's not enough
Em/F#  G           Am       D     G  G/F#  C  C/B  Am  Bm  D
I've given all I can, but we're still on the payroll

sections.label: Bridge
content: Bm          D            G        D        G         D        E
And for a minute there, I lost myself, I lost myself
Bm          D            G        D        G         D        E
For a minute there, I lost myself, I lost myself

sections.label: Instrumental
content: Bm  D  G  D  G  D  E  E

sections.label: Outro
content: Bm  D  G  D  G  D  E  E
Bm  D  G  D  G  D  E  E
